location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 860/1916 Pt 1 'Persia: consular appointment at Shiraz'

mods.abstract: The part comprises telegrams, despatches, correspondence, memoranda, and notes, relating to the consular appointment at Shiraz.The correspondence discusses:Shiraz consulate accountsKermanshah and Shiraz consular escortsKermanshah consular appointmentsIspahan consular appointments.Correspondents include the Under-Secretary of State, India Office; His Majesty's Consul, Shiraz; and the Viceroy.
